name: Doki Doki Ninjin 🥕
description:
Doki Doki Ninjin 🐇🥕

Today is Harvest Day and it is so exciting ! Everyone is gathering vegetables and fruits and selling them at East City. You're attending it and you want to surprise everyone by bringing Golden Carrots !!!

Give us a note :

Please give us a note on Ludum Dare

Controls InputActions[ ← ]Move Left[ → ]Move Right[  ↑  ]Jump / Go through doors[  ↓  ]Harvest a plant / Throw a plant[ Enter ]Confirm choice / Start

Made in 72 hours by WobblyHorse and Menica Folden for Ludum Dare 52

Original music by https://www.instagram.com/collinemusique/
